member.name: M:main(void)
member.summary: This is the program entry point.

member.name: M:RegisterHook(PHOOKTABLE,PFNHOOK)
member.summary: This function registers a pre or post process hook function. Pre-process hook functions will be called before the ProjProcessData is called. Post-proces hook functions will be called after ProjProcessData is called.
member.param: Points to the Hook table to add the registered processing function.
Specifies the hook function to be registered.
member.returns: Failure: Returns FALSE (e.g. table is full).

member.name: M:InitHookTable(PHOOKTABLE)
member.summary: This function intializes the hook table.

member.name: M:ProcessHooks(PHOOKTABLE)
member.summary: This function goes through the hook table and calls each hook function.

member.name: M:BaseInitialization(void)
member.summary: This function performs base code initializations which are not project specific.
